subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ray Emery stopped 15 shots to register his third shutout this postseason and Daniel Alfredsson scored an easy goal for the Ottawa Senators on Monday night in a 1-0 victory over the Buffalo Sabres in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: Ray Emery stopped 15 shots to register his third shutout this postseason and Daniel Alfredsson scored an easy goal for the Ottawa Senators on Monday night in a 1-0 victory over the Buffalo Sabres in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals.
